scripts.lint: eslint *.js tests && echo LINTING OK || (echo LINTING ERROR; false)
scripts.modules: npm ls 2>&1 && echo NPMLS OK || echo NPMLS ERROR
scripts.versions: echo -n 'NODE ' && node -v && echo -n 'NPM ' && npm -v && node -e 'console.log(process.versions);' && echo VERSIONS OK || echo VERSIONS ERROR
scripts.sysinfo: uname -a && cat /proc/meminfo && df -h . && echo SYSINFO OK || echo SYSINFO ERROR
scripts.spec: TEST=true tape tests/tests.js && echo SPEC TESTS OK || (echo SPEC TESTS ERROR; false)
scripts.test: npm run versions && npm run lint && npm run spec && echo NPM TEST OK || (echo NPM TEST ERROR; false)
